Ann_Rain: Zone 1 tends to have higher annual rainfall than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Ann_Radn: There was little spatial difference in annual solar radiation.Zone 1 tends to have lower annual radiaition than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Ann_T.Max: Zone 3 tends to have higher annual maximum temperatures than Zone 2 or Zone 1.
Ann_T.Min: Zone 2 tends to have higher annual mimimum temperatures than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Ann_ThermTime: Zone 2 tends to have higher annual thermal time than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Sum_Rain: Zone 1 tends to have higher summer rainfall than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Sum_Radn: There was little spatial difference in summer solar radiation.Zone 1 tends to have lower summer radiaition than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Sum_T.Max: Zone 3 tends to have higher summer maximum temperatures than Zone 2 or Zone 1.
Sum_T.Min: Zone 2 tends to have higher summer mimimum temperatures than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Sum_ThermTime: Zone 2 tends to have higher summer thermal time than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Aut_Rain: Zone 1 tends to have higher autumn rainfall than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Aut_Radn: There was little spatial difference in autumn solar radiation.Zone 1 tends to have lower autumn radiaition than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Aut_T.Max: Zone 3 tends to have higher autumn maximum temperatures than Zone 2 or Zone 1.
Aut_T.Min: Zone 2 tends to have higher autumn mimimum temperatures than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Aut_ThermTime: Zone 2 tends to have higher autumn thermal time than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Win_Rain: Zone 1 tends to have higher winter rainfall than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Win_Radn: There was little spatial difference in winter solar radiation.Zone 1 tends to have lower winter radiaition than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Win_T.Max: Zone 3 tends to have higher winter maximum temperatures than Zone 2 or Zone 1.
Win_T.Min: Zone 2 tends to have higher winter mimimum temperatures than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Win_ThermTime: Zone 2 tends to have higher winter thermal time than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Spr_Rain: Zone 1 tends to have higher spring rainfall than Zone 2 or Zone 3. Zone 2 has the lowest spring rainfall.
Spr_Radn: There was little spatial difference in spring solar radiation.Zone 1 tends to have lower spring radiaition than Zone 2 or Zone 3.
Spr_T.Max: Zone 3 tends to have higher spring maximum temperatures than Zone 2 or Zone 1.
Spr_T.Min: Zone 2 tends to have higher spring mimimum temperatures than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
Spr_ThermTime: Zone 2 tends to have higher spring thermal time than Zone 3 or Zone 1.
